prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: American Rhododendron Society, Middle Atlantic Chapter, Papers, 1959-1980 , Accession # 10553-ae, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Middle Atlantic Chapter of the American Rhododendron Society, through Sandra McDonald.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of the Middle Atlantic Chapter of the American Rhododendron Society, ca. 1952-1966, consists of ca. 440 slides of rhododendrons and related material, taken by Dr. Thomas Wheeldon, and a bound scrapbook containing a copy of the early by-laws, minutes, and membership of the Chapter, 1952-1963. Slides includes examples of Exbury azaleas, rhododendrons from the National Arboretum, Hilary G. Neighbors plants, rhododendrons of E.L. Manigault, Charles Owen Dexter hybrids, Joseph B. Gable hybrids, G. Guy Nearing crosses, peonies, and pictures from early meetings of the American Rhododendron Society.
